name: part_001
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ生誕祭2025 】超重大発表あり！Sincerely,Towa【 3DLIVE 】 [I4FbpwMb78U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs 'Akuma no Ko' (The Child of Evil) by Ai Higuchi.
A short transition with a black screen and changing lights before the next song begins.
Tokoyami Towa performs her original song 'S.T.Y.'.

subtitles.original: 同じ形 同じ体温の悪魔
subtitles.english: Devils of the same shape and the same body temperature.

subtitles.original: 僕はダメで あいつはいいの？
subtitles.english: Am I no good and they're okay?

subtitles.original: そこに壁があっただけなのに
subtitles.english: When there was simply a wall there.

subtitles.original: 生まれてしまった 運命嘆くな
subtitles.english: Don't lament the fate of being born.

subtitles.original: 僕らはみんな
subtitles.english: Because we are all

subtitles.original: 自由なんだから
subtitles.english: Free.

subtitles.original: 鳥のように 羽があれば
subtitles.english: If I had wings like a bird,

subtitles.original: どこへだって 行けるけど
subtitles.english: I could go anywhere.

subtitles.original: 帰る場所が なければ
subtitles.english: But if I have no place to return to,

subtitles.original: きっとどこへも行けない
subtitles.english: I surely can't go anywhere.

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I don't want to just exist.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will love you.

subtitles.original: なにを犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I have to sacrifice.

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will protect you.

subtitles.original: 間違いだとしても 疑ったりしない
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mistake, I won't doubt it.

subtitles.original: 正しさとは自分のこと 強く信じることだ
subtitles.english: Righteousness is to believe strongly in oneself.

subtitles.original: 鉄の雨が降り頻る情景 テレビの中 映画に見えたんだ
subtitles.english: The scene of iron rain falling incessantly; it looked like a movie on TV.

subtitles.original: 戦争なんて愚かな凶暴 関係ない 知らない国の話
subtitles.english: War is such foolish brutality; it's an irrelevant story of a country I don't know.

subtitles.original: それならなんで あいつ憎んで 黒い気持ち 隠しきれない理由
subtitles.english: Then why do I hate them? The reason I can't hide these dark feelings.

subtitles.original: 説明だってできやしないんだ 僕らはなんて矛盾ばっかなんだ
subtitles.english: I can't even explain it; we are just full of contradictions.

subtitles.original: この言葉も訳されれば 本当の意味は伝わらない
subtitles.english: Even if these words are translated, the true meaning won't be conveyed.

subtitles.original: 信じるのはその目を開いて 触れた世界だけ
subtitles.english: All I believe in is the world I saw and touched with my own eyes.

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I don't want to just exist.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will love you.

subtitles.original: なにを犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I have to sacrifice.

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will protect you.

subtitles.original: 選んだ人の影 捨てたものの屍
subtitles.english: The shadows of those chosen, the corpses of those cast aside.

subtitles.original: 気づいたんだ 自分の中 育つのは悪魔の子
subtitles.english: I realized that what's growing inside of me is a child of evil.

subtitles.original: 正義の裏 犠牲の中 心には悪魔の子
subtitles.english: Behind justice, amidst sacrifice, there is a child of evil in my heart.

subtitles.original: そっと振り返って 奇跡どうしたって光って
subtitles.english: Looking back softly, the miracle shines no matter what.

subtitles.original: ありふれて君が いつだってスーパーヒーロー
subtitles.english: Though it's common, you are always a superhero.

subtitles.original: いつもポンコツだった私 止めなくて 未完成
subtitles.english: I've always been a klutz, don't stop me, I'm incomplete.

subtitles.original: アヒルの子はアヒルのまま 飛べないなんてさ
subtitles.english: Saying that an ugly duckling stays a duckling and can't fly.

subtitles.original: 正しさなんて放っておいて 君となんかちょっと似ていて
subtitles.english: Leaving righteousness aside, I'm somewhat similar to you.

subtitles.original: 凸凹だからジャストに噛み合うパズルピース
subtitles.english: Puzzle pieces that fit just right because they're uneven.

subtitles.original: 繋げたい 繋げたい 届かない言葉も
subtitles.english: I want to connect, I want to connect even the words that won't reach.

subtitles.original: いつかは誰かの何かに なりたいから
subtitles.english: Because someday I want to become something to someone.

subtitles.original: Crazy, Noisy, 夢の中
subtitles.english: Crazy, noisy, in a dream.

subtitles.original: 夢を見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a dream.

subtitles.original: Always going!
subtitles.english: Always going!

subtitles.original: 何千回 何万回 膝をついても
subtitles.english: No matter how many thousands or tens of thousands of times I fall on my knees.

subtitles.original: 最大限 アイラブユーで立ち上がれるから
subtitles.english: I can stand up with a maximum 'I love you'.

subtitles.original: とびきりのサンキュー 消えないハッピーも勇気も
subtitles.english: An extraordinary 'thank you', for the happiness and courage that won't fade.
